greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Length of period of continued for sqrt(A003814(n)).
comment: If the period length of the continued fraction of a quadratic surd sqrt(D) is odd, the negative Pell equation x^2 - D y^2 = -1 has (infinite) solutions.
link: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Select[Map[Length@ Last@ ContinuedFraction@ Sqrt@ # &, Range[550]], OddQ] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 06 2017, after _T. D. Noe_ at A003814 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Walter Gilbert
